dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Autonomous cars can drive themselves by sensing their environment using techniques like radar, GPS, and computer vision.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That is amazing. Are they safe?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Autonomous cars have the potential to be really safe, with fewer traffic collisions and injuries, thanks to their advanced sensing and control systems.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Are there more or less accidents with humans driving or a autonomous vehicle?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Autonomous cars are expected to have fewer accidents than human drivers due to their advanced sensing and control systems.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That sounds fantastic. That is a good thing. I know many people are careless when they drive so this will be an improvement.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, autonomous cars can help reduce accidents, lower costs, and even make driving easier for people who can't drive themselves.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That is true many more people will be able to rely on these vehicles.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, autonomous cars can offer increased mobility for many, including children, the elderly, and those with disabilities.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Wonderful! When do you think we will see regular usage of these vehicles?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Widespread use of autonomous cars could be a few years away, as technology continues to develop and regulatory hurdles are addressed.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am looking forward to that time. I personally hate driving so I would use this type of vehicle.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's great to hear you're excited, and as the technology improves, autonomous cars will make driving a lot more convenient and stress-free for people like you!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I can't wait! Will they cost more than regular vehicles?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Initially, autonomous cars might cost more due to advanced technology, but prices may decrease over time as they become more common.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, that is what will happen. Do you think many people will use these cars?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Many people are expected to use autonomous cars due to their potential benefits, like increased safety and convenience.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is a whole new thing. Eventually it will be a common thing. I think that this is almost futuristic. However we are living it now.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, it does feel like something out of a sci-fi movie, but we're living in exciting times where autonomous cars could soon become a common sight on the roads!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What companies make these cars now?
